topics.body:
And another thing is you have to see it for yourself. Read it to see if you like it or not. 

Just going off of what people are telling you are just sometimes not enough for some.

That way if you don't like it at least you have seen it. And you judge it based on your own experience.

Like Squiggy and Attack on Titan. he didn't like it. BUT he watched it. And he went off of his experience instead of others.

topics.body:
KATANAGATARI COMPLETE! Final thoughts.
[spoiler]It was good. Nothing really spectacular though. I feel like the series could have carried more emotional weight if they cut the run time for each episode in half. And I bet that the story worked much better as a novel than it did an anime. The final scene with Shichika going up the castle beasting on motherfuckers was an awesome climax. All in all, I don't regret watching it. But I don't think I'll be watching it again.[/spoiler]
